headline.publications.title: Publications
headline.publications.abstract: The project involves research and teaching activities leading to the production of several products and the organisation of events. The main outputs include a thematic e-publication, oral history interviews, a book, workshops, residencies by visiting scholars, digital tools, e-teaching modules, a training course and a collaborative platform.
